contextId.occurrenceNote: This refers to dying. Alternate translation: "he will die" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
This is a polite expression for death. Alternate translation: "after he dies" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])

contextId.glQuote: Then man goes to his eternal home
